title: I NEED HELP PLEASE.
body: I updated the client to the patch 6.23 and now sometimes it wont let me log into the game. Saying there is a problem with my internet when there is not. Sometimes it comes up with a box that says that i need to restart or shutdown. this has been happening for the past week this is really annoying can someone send me a way to fix it. daring this week i could log in two times and play but usually i can't. Please help me.

replies.body: I've started having similar problems today. The login gets stucked in authenticating taking forever and after a long time it say it failed to connect to the servers. Also the client is taking way too long to open.
exactly what is happening to me but i had this for a week. ) ':

I've seen some routing issues along Telia's network, which affects players on many different ISPs in EU. I'd like you to run a traceroute log so we can see what's going on. First, grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) then plug **185.40.65.1** into the host field before you start the trace. After the trace has run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

Let me know if you run into issues.

There are definitely some big problems along your route. These issues start immediately after your first hop outside of your home network, where your connection spikes to **965 ms** of latency and continues along your entire route. I'd strongly recommend reaching out to your ISP technical support team with this traceroute so they can launch an investigation.

Let me know if you have any questions.

i called the company that provides me with the internet, and they came did all what they can do they said the problem is from your game. 
And actually i see that i wasted their time because everything is working except League Of Legends.

Also, for some reason I can some times log in and play for hours with no problem, but it happens rarely
and when i can log I haven't changed anything it just log in.

I've been playing with the same thing in the same place for 9 months haven't gotten any problems till last week sir. So the problem is not from here it is from Riot. ye I have a bad ping in game 150MS but still can play and enjoy the game.

I think I'm getting the same issue, but I am able to login (eventually). Once in game i'm fine, but every now and then the client kind of stutters and pops up the message:
